amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the SEC to identify, analyze and address potential conflicts of interest related to its rulemakings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 115-3 to require the SEC to identify, analyze and address potential conflicts of interest related to its rulemakings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 233 (Roll no. 46).

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Green, Al.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Green, Al amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 233 (Roll no. 46).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
